body.name: SONGMICS Shoe Rack, 3 Tier Shoe Organizer, Fabric Shoe Shelf Storage with 4 Hooks, Holds up to 12 Pairs of Shoes, Height-Adjustable Shoe Rack for Entryway, Hallway, Closet, Easy Assembly, Ink Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 13 hrs 2 mins
features: [Customizable Shelving Design] You can remove one shelf or adjust the height of each shelf by inserting into different holes to accommodate different shoes. Tailor it to your needs for a truly customized storage solution!
[Store Your Shoes with Ease] With each level of our shoe shelf designed to comfortably fit 3-4 pairs of shoes, you can enjoy organized, easy-to-access storage for your preferred footwear!

[Convenient Side Storage] Equipped with 2 support rails for hanging high heels and 4 hooks for brushes and small items, our shoe organizer brings all your footwear essentials together in one convenient spot

[Durable and Easy to Clean] The shoe organizer is constructed from deformation-resistant polyester fabric, ensuring long-lasting durability. Plus, it's effortless to clean—simply wipe it down when it gets dirty
[Assembly is a Breeze] Thanks to its simple structure and easy-to-follow instructions, putting together this adjustable shoe rack is as easy as pie!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my needs, easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: Wonderful shoe rack option for small spaces and budgets!Pros:-Includes everything you need.-Instructions are clear pictures with letters matching the corresponding bags.-Easy to assemble, I did it myself in 10 minutes. (I am slow.)-The shelves are made of fabric and feel sturdy once everything is put together with the metal frame.-Fits nicely in the closet and can hold a lot of shoes. You can place the shelves closer or further apart, to fit other things.I highly recommend this shoe rack, it was actually a pleasure to put it together myself, yay! Thank you so much! .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is great! It took maybe 5 minutes to put together. I love that it's so big! I have this smaller gray one at the front door to have quick access to them, or to leave whatever nature decides to give you at the door. And I really like it, so when I found this one - with two levels instead of just one - I decided to get it and try it out. I'm SO happy I did. But I wasn't at first. When it first arrived, I held the length of fabric to compare with the gray one I have, and it was MUCH longer. More space for more shoes, but it wouldn't fit where I had wanted to put it. I honestly wasn't sure it would fit in my closet. But it DID! I had some scrappy plastic one, and I decided to remove that one and replace it with this one, and it works! It has PLENTY of room for shoes, and by building the bottom shelf up off the ground, it's like 3 tiers for shoes!! If you need one similar to this, GET THIS!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This shoe rack was easy to put together w it h clear instructions and all the necessary hardware. It feels very sturdy and holds about 9 pair of adult shoes. Fits great in a small closet or an entry way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 3 tier 11 x 26.7 x 20.8
reviews.reviewText: Fits perfect in our entryway closet. It was fairly easy to assemble, took me probably 10 min. max. I like that the bars are metal as opposed to plastic. You could fit 3 pairs of adult shoes on each tier and then an additional 3 pairs underneath the last tier (12 pairs in all).I really like the polyester fabric on this, as opposed to the non-woven fabric that many other shoe racks have in this price range. I definitely was able to tell the difference right off the bat. The polyester fabric feels a lot more durable and very similar to oxford fabric.Mine did have some sharp bits in some of the screw holes, so please be wary of that when assembling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for what it is
reviews.reviewText: Clear directions. Easy to assemble. Holds a good amount. Sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am very happy with this shoe organizer. It was super easy to assemble and I did it all by my self. Everything you need is in it. It holds a lot of shoes and makes my door way look amazing. If you need a shoe holder this is the best one I have found.
